column1: Little Goat Diner////I had the pork/chocolate shake and fat club. I'm in love with everything about this place. EVERYTHING! The ambiance
column6: food....oh goodness I could go on and on with the adjectives. Gosh
column7: you know it's an amazing place when I can't even properly type a coherent review. My heart is here. Glad I was a tourist in my hometown. New favorite must visit place whenever I go home!
